== Main Inclusion Report for decibel ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/d/decibel]]</nowiki>; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of KDE 4
 0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=decibel|no CVE entries]]</nowiki>: ...
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=decibel|no Secunia history]]</nowiki>: ...
** Runs as a daemon running as user
** Does not use network directly (but talks to telepathy daemon which uses the network)
** Data processing and storing done by it and telepathy daemon
** No known source code review performed
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** The package always works out of the box without configuration
** The package asks no debconf questions
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:decibel|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: One, obsolete
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/d/decibel.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is active
** <nowiki>[[http://decibel.kde.org|Upstream]]</nowiki> is active (also author hunger sits on #kubuntu-devel)
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.kde.org/buglist.cgi?product=decibel&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED|Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>: None open
** Hardware: Does not deal with hardware
** No test suite
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant
** Debian library policy compliant
** Packaging system (cdbs)
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** Qt, cmake, dbus, all in main.  telepathy-qt, tapioca-qt needing main approval.
 0. ''Background information:''
** Upstream call it decibel
